root.name: Death Inc.
root.description: Death Inc is a real-time strategy game where players control the Grim Reaper as he tries to spread the Bubonic Plague through medieval Europe. The game was initially pitched on Kickstarter but failed to meet its target. Still hoping to crowdfund the game, Ambient began offering Death Inc. pre-orders on their website for $10. Players who pre-ordered got access to an early alpha. Less than 2 weeks later the studio shut down due to insufficient funds. The Death Inc. alpha is now free to download on Ambient's web site.
